languages.text: {n}Авель Ханейманн, как всегда тихий и загадочный, держится осторожно и с любопытством оглядывает руины внутреннего убранства корабля. Когда вы приближаетесь, он приветствует вас тихой фразой:{/n} "Здесь звучали шаги смерти".

{n}Quiet and mysterious as always, Abel Haneumann's demeanour is a mixture of cautiousness and curiosity as he inspects the ship's ruined interior. When you approach him, he acknowledges you by saying softly,{/n} "Death's footsteps were heard here."
languages.original_text: {n}Авель Ханейманн, как всегда тихий и загадочный, держится осторожно и с любопытством оглядывает руины внутреннего убранства корабля. Когда вы приближаетесь, он приветствует вас тихой фразой:{/n} "Здесь звучали шаги смерти".

languages.text: {n}アベル・ヘニュマンの振る舞いは相変わらず静かで謎めいている。慎重さと好奇心を同居させた状態で船内部の損傷を点検していた。あなたが近づいてくることに気づき、彼は柔らかい物腰で話しはじめた。{/n}「死の足音はここでも聞こえるようだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Quiet and mysterious as always, Abel Haneumann's demeanour is a mixture of cautiousness and curiosity as he inspects the ship's ruined interior. When you approach him, he acknowledges you by saying softly,{/n} "Death's footsteps were heard here."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベル・ヘニュマンの振る舞いは相変わらず静かで謎めいている。慎重さと好奇心を同居させた状態で船内部の損傷を点検していた。あなたが近づいてくることに気づき、彼は柔らかい物腰で話しはじめた。{/n}「死の足音はここでも聞こえるようだ」
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}亚伯·哈努曼一如既往地安静而神秘。他检查着这艘遇难飞船的内部，谨慎的行动中混杂着些许好奇。当你走近时，亚伯轻声对你开了口。{/n}“死神的脚步声曾在这里响起。”
languages.original_text: {n}Quiet and mysterious as always, Abel Haneumann's demeanour is a mixture of cautiousness and curiosity as he inspects the ship's ruined interior. When you approach him, he acknowledges you by saying softly,{/n} "Death's footsteps were heard here."

traits.locale_text: {n}亚伯·哈努曼一如既往地安静而神秘。他检查着这艘遇难飞船的内部，谨慎的行动中混杂着些许好奇。当你走近时，亚伯轻声对你开了口。{/n}“死神的脚步声曾在这里响起。”
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel Haneumann, aussi silencieux et mystérieux qu'à son habitude, inspecte l'intérieur du vaisseau avec un mélange de circonspection et de curiosité. Au moment où vous approchez, il déclare à mi-voix :{/n} « La Mort est venue en ces lieux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Quiet and mysterious as always, Abel Haneumann's demeanour is a mixture of cautiousness and curiosity as he inspects the ship's ruined interior. When you approach him, he acknowledges you by saying softly,{/n} "Death's footsteps were heard here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel Haneumann, aussi silencieux et mystérieux qu'à son habitude, inspecte l'intérieur du vaisseau avec un mélange de circonspection et de curiosité. Au moment où vous approchez, il déclare à mi-voix :{/n} « La Mort est venue en ces lieux. »
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Mientras Abel Haneumann inspecciona el interior de las ruinas de la nave, tan tranquilo y misterioso como siempre, su actitud es una mezcla de cautela y curiosidad. Cuando te acercas a él, te reconoce diciéndote tranquilamente:{/n} «Aquí se han escuchado los pasos de la muerte».
languages.original_text: {n}Quiet and mysterious as always, Abel Haneumann's demeanour is a mixture of cautiousness and curiosity as he inspects the ship's ruined interior. When you approach him, he acknowledges you by saying softly,{/n} "Death's footsteps were heard here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mientras Abel Haneumann inspecciona el interior de las ruinas de la nave, tan tranquilo y misterioso como siempre, su actitud es una mezcla de cautela y curiosidad. Cuando te acercas a él, te reconoce diciéndote tranquilamente:{/n} «Aquí se han escuchado los pasos de la muerte».
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel Haneumann ist still und mysteriös wie immer. Mit einer Mischung aus Vorsicht und Neugier inspiziert er das zerstörte Innere des Schiffs. Als du dich ihm näherst, sagt er leise:{/n} "Hier waren die Schritte des Todes zu hören."
languages.original_text: {n}Quiet and mysterious as always, Abel Haneumann's demeanour is a mixture of cautiousness and curiosity as he inspects the ship's ruined interior. When you approach him, he acknowledges you by saying softly,{/n} "Death's footsteps were heard here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel Haneumann ist still und mysteriös wie immer. Mit einer Mischung aus Vorsicht und Neugier inspiziert er das zerstörte Innere des Schiffs. Als du dich ihm näherst, sagt er leise:{/n} "Hier waren die Schritte des Todes zu hören."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel Haneumann, her zaman olduğu gibi sessiz ve gizemli. Geminin harap haldeki iç kısımlarını incelerken hem temkinli hem de meraklı davranıyor. Ona yaklaştığında hafif bir sesle varlığının farkında olduğunu belirtiyor.{/n} "Burada ölümün ayak sesleri duyulmuş."
languages.original_text: {n}Quiet and mysterious as always, Abel Haneumann's demeanour is a mixture of cautiousness and curiosity as he inspects the ship's ruined interior. When you approach him, he acknowledges you by saying softly,{/n} "Death's footsteps were heard here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel Haneumann her zaman olduğu gibi sessiz ve gizemli. Davranışları, geminin harap haldeki iç kısımlarını incelerken hem temkinli hem de meraklı. Ona yaklaştığında hafif bir sesle varlığının farkında olduğunu belirtiyor:{/n} "Burada ölümün ayak sesleri duyulmuş."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved
